name: Flappy Fly Hard - Not An Easy Bird Game Impossible!
name_original: Flappy Fly Hard - Not An Easy Bird Game Impossible!
description:
#FlyHard - The Hardest Flying Game on iOS!?

Can YOU beat MY all time high score of 11?

(How to Play)
> Tap & Hold to Flap, release to fall
> Avoid Brick Walls

• Simple One Touch Controls
• 3 Playable Character
• Multiplayer Mode
• Record Replay & Share Your High Scores!

Download now 100% FREE.
